1000034503.title: Bang Bang
1000034503.description: Rajveer sets out to steal the world's most coveted diamond, the Kohinoor, triggering a series of fights, car chases and a revenge plot.

1000034506.title: Singham Returns
1000034506.description: Bad-ass cop Bajirao Singham is back as the DCP of Mumbai. To pave the way for justice, he has to deal with a corrupt politician and an immoral god-man.
1000034506.contentProvider: Ajay Devgn Films, Rohit Shetty Productions
1000034506.cpDisplayName: Ajay Devgn Films, Rohit Shetty Productions

1000053838.title: Baby
1000053838.description: Post 26/11 Mumbai attacks, a special intelligence task force will stop at nothing to foil another such assault on the Indian soil.

1000065771.title: Bodyguard
1000065771.description: A bodyguard falls in love with a woman over the phone, without realising that she is actually the woman he is protecting.

1000109846.title: 10 Ka Dum
1000109846.description: A local don hires a driver, Vikram, to escort a young woman to Daksha Bhai's house. A game of cat and mouse begins when Vikram realises their true motive.

1000152229.title: Dishoom
1000152229.description: A no-nonsense cop accompanied by a rookie go on a 36-hour manhunt for a missing Indian cricketer, who has been kidnapped under mysterious circumstances.

1000213010.title: Taqdeer
1000213010.description: Avinash gets separated from his childhood love Priya. Will fate play its part and bring the two estranged lovers together as grown-ups?

1000213089.title: Baaghi 2
1000213089.description: A tough army officer searches for his ex-lover's child, who is kidnapped under mysterious circumstances. However, his quest is not easy.

1000220603.title: Aiyaary
1000220603.description: Jai Bakshi, an ex-military man,  pledges to bring the government down. Now it is up to Colonel Abhay Singh, his superior, who has to stop him at all costs.

1000230498.title: Shaolin
1000230498.description: Hou Jie, the warlord has defeated his rival. However, the victory has come at a heavy price. Dispirited, he turns to a Shaolin monastery to atone for his sins.

1000230996.title: Jawaan
1000230996.description: When Keshav, an international criminal, plans to destroy India, his childhood friend Jai takes it upon himself to save the day, even at the cost of his family.

1000235906.title: Junglee
1000235906.description: Back in his hometown after years, Raj befriends Bhola, an elephant. As time passes, he discovers a deep-rooted poaching scandal, which changes his life forever.

1000239447.title: Indiaâ€™s Most Wanted
1000239447.description: Five ordinary men, one global terrorist, witness India's biggest manhunt operation in this film inspired by true events.

1260012707.title: Kanpuriye
1260012707.description: Jaitun, Jugnu and Vijay's dreams are hanging by a thread. While they struggle to prove their mettle, life keeps taking them for a spin.
1260012707.detail: Moderate coarse Language, Strong sexual references

1260022117.title: Tanhaji
1260022117.description: As Aurangzeb captures the Kondhana Fort, Tanhaji Malusare, Shivaji Maharaj's trusted military leader and braveheart, ventures out to win it back.

1260024321.title: Angrezi Medium
1260024321.description: Champak, a simple Mithai-seller, will go to any lengths to fulfil daughter Tarika's dream of studying in London, triggering a chain of hilarious misadventures.

1260025583.title: Baaghi 3
1260025583.description: In a twisted turn of events, when a group of deadly terrorists kidnap Ronnie's elder brother in Syria, he sets off on a mission to bring him back.

1260036203.title: The Big Bull
1260036203.description: During the late '80s, Hemant Shah, the man with the Midas touch, pulled off the biggest hustle that shook India's financial fabric. Inspired by true events.

1260042584.title: Bahut Hua Sammaan
1260042584.description: Perpetually failing engineering students Bony and Fundoo get talked into robbing a bank by the campus loon. What follows is something neither anticipated.

1260053117.title: Chaddi
1260053117.description: Trapped in a loveless marriage, Mrs Chaddha, a lonely housewife, finds an unusual love. As she falls further, a weird secret unravels.
